lead_paragraph: The only thing that has slowed Justin Fargas since he became the Oakland Raiders’ starting running back has been the defense of the Minnesota Vikings, which held him to 60 yards rushing. Fargas’s opponent today, the Denver Broncos, should not be nearly as challenging.
